original_text:
The wicked draw the sword
    and bend the bow
to bring down the poor and needy,
    to slay those whose ways are upright.
korean_text: 악인이 칼을 빼고 활을 당겨 가난하고 궁핍한 자를 엎드러뜨리며 행위가 정직한 자를 죽이고자 하나

sentences.original_text: to bring down the poor and needy
sentences.korean_translation: 가난한 자와 궁핍한 자를 엎드러뜨리려 함이로다

sentences.original_text: to slay those whose ways are upright
